QuestData.Title: We Can Rebuild Him
QuestData.Description:
Gatamatos needs numerous repairs to meet functional standards.
Upkeeping phalynx is part of the role. Lend a hand so we may finish the repairs thoroughly and quickly.
QuestData.RewardText: He may appear to be returned to perfect shape, but he must be re-tested and trained.

Objectives.Objective: Talk to Pelodis to finish repair
